question:
For a physical fitness test, scores are determined by the expression \(2ps â€“ 45m\), where \(p\) and \(s\) are the numbers of push-ups and sit-ups an athlete can do in one minute for each activity and m is the number of minutes the athlete takes to run a mile. During the test, Abraham did 21 push-ups and 30 sit-ups and ran the mile in 10 minutes. Javed got the same score, but did 4 more push-ups and ran the mile in 12 minutes. How many sit-ups did Javed do in one minute?
(A) 16
(B) 19
(C) 25
(D) 27
(E) 35
